charges.charge_description: 18:113D.P; ASSAULT, OTHER; Assault by Striking, Beating, or Wounding(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Committed to the BOP for a term of imprisonment of 12 Months, to be served CONCURRENTLY with the term imposed in counts 3, 4, 5, and 6, with credit for time served; No Fine; $10 Special Assessment.
